title: Smoking: it's your choice
creator_credit: Alfred Higgins Productions and Alfred Higgins
brief_description: An open-ended film designed to stimulate thought and class discussion; the aim of this film is to help young people make a decision about smoking cigarettes. Animation is used to show how smoking affects the lungs, causing diseases such as lung cancer and emphysema.
